attributes.action: Find every willing but unemployed person in the UK a job.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been trying for over a year to find a job now, and to no avail. There are thousands if not millions of people across the UK in the same position as myself. Since the current recession is largely the fault of you, the Prime Minister, in your current role, and your previous role of Chancellor of the Exchequer, I believe it is your responsibility to find work for every one of us.
